text: e Covenant and the secrets of Amenti had been placed with the Blue Flame Melchizedek Essenes by the Azurite Council. The Blue Flame Melchizedeks taught the original, non-patriarchal, egalitarian creed of the undistorted Templar Creed, including the sacred teachings of the science of ascension, the reality of reincarnation and ET ancestry and the pre- cepts of unity consciousness and the Sacred Law of One. The two groups co- existed with each other within the Essene brotherhood until 12 BC, when the Azurite Council orchestrated the next major event in preparing the races for ascension. 98
